item.title: Impact Signals #2: AI Drones Turning Wars on Civilians, World's First Wildfire Early Action Protocol, Google Expands Flood Forecasting Across Africa
item.description:
Impact Signals #2: AI Drones Turning Wars on Civilians, World's First Wildfire Early Action Protocol, Google Expands Flood Forecasting Across Africa
AI for Impact Daily Briefing ‚Äî February 14, 2026
The ICRC president warns at Munich Security Conference that AI-powered drones are turning wars into wars on civilians. Meanwhile, the IFRC activates the world's first AI-driven wildfire Early Action Protocol in Chile ‚Äî forecast-based financing that released funds automatically before fires hit peak intensity. Google expands flood forecasting across Africa with the AU, WHO launches an AI emergency response toolkit, and Caltech unveils a multi-modal search-and-rescue robot.
TOP STORIES
1. ICRC Chief Warns AI & Drones Turning Wars on Civilians ‚Äî ICRC President Spoljaric at Munich Security Conference: "There's never a moment where drones fight against drones." Calls for protective interpretation of international humanitarian law.
2. IFRC Activates World's First Wildfire Early Action Protocol in Chile ‚Äî Predictive models triggered automatic release of 95,000 CHF to help 2,000 people before fires peaked. Additional 500,000 CHF supported evacuation of 50,000.
3. Google Expands AI Flood Forecasting Across Africa ‚Äî Flood Hub expands to Nigeria and Ethiopia. GiveDirectly delivers pre-disaster cash transfers based on AI predictions. AU Commission partnership signals continental scale.
4. WHO Launches AI-Powered Emergency Response Toolkit (AIM) ‚Äî Generative AI compresses emergency response documents from weeks to minutes. Now in production.
5. Caltech Unveils X1: Multi-Modal SAR Robot ‚Äî Hybrid humanoid-drone that walks, flies, and drives autonomously. GPS-denied drone navigation also released by Sparc AI.
6. University of Twente: AI + Drone Logistics Simulation ‚Äî Tested on six historical disasters. Optimizes for cost, speed, risk, and suffering reduction simultaneously.
7. Salesforce Agentforce Powers Good360 Disaster Relief Matching ‚Äî AI cut donation-matching time from 30 to 10 minutes during LA wildfires.
8. AI Heatwave Early Warning for Gulf Region ‚Äî Khalifa University study on 2024 Makkah heatwave (1,300+ deaths). AI can predict extreme heat days in advance.
UPCOMING: India AI Impact Summit (Feb 16-20, New Delhi) ‚Äî first Global South AI summit. IBM Impact Accelerator applications open through March 25. AAAI AI+HADR Symposium April 7-9.
ACTIVE MONITORING: Vanuatu M6.4 earthquake (Feb 14). Colombia flooding ‚Äî HNRP 2026 launched. South Sudan Jonglei conflict ‚Äî 280K displaced. Syria ongoing response. Haiti displacement from Port-au-Prince attacks.
Full research, sources, and links at impactsignalsai.substack.com
